activities:
Personal Information regarding prospective, current, and former Covidien employees in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland is transferred to the US for customary and legitimate business purposes, such as reaching decisions about hiring, placement and promotion; providing compensation and benefits; offering training and career development; supporting other Human Resources programs and services; meeting legal, audit and insurance requirements; and ensuring compliance with Company policies.

Also, Personal Information regarding patients, customers, suppliers, and health care professionals located in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland is transferred to the US for customary and legitimate business purposes, such as clinical research; product safety and quality monitoring activities; providing education and training; expense management; supporting business operations; meeting legal, audit and insurance requirements; and ensuring compliance with Company policies.
contactoff1: Covidien's Privacy and Data Security Office
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Electronically and manually processed human resources data, clinical data, marketing data, customer data, supplier data, and health care professional data.
recoursemech: HR data: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).  All other data: JAMS
